001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.controller;
002
003import android.app.Dialog;
004import android.content.DialogInterface;
005import android.os.Bundle;
006import android.text.Editable;
007import android.text.TextWatcher;
008import android.view.LayoutInflater;
009import android.view.View;
010import android.view.ViewGroup;
011import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
012import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
013import androidx.appcompat.app.AlertDialog;
014import androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment;
015import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.databinding.FragmentEditPassphraseBinding;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.model.Passphrase;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.viewmodel.PassphraseViewModel;
020import java.util.regex.Pattern;
021import java.util.stream.Collectors;
022
023public class EditPassphraseFragment extends DialogFragment implements TextWatcher {
024
025  private static final Pattern SPLITTER = Pattern.compile("\\W+");
026
027  private FragmentEditPassphraseBinding binding;
028  private PassphraseViewModel viewModel;
029  private String key;
030  private AlertDialog dialog;
031  private Passphrase passphrase;
032
033  @NonNull
034  @Override
035  public Dialog onCreateDialog(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
036    binding = FragmentEditPassphraseBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater(), null, false);
037    key = EditPassphraseFragmentArgs.fromBundle(getArguments()).getKey();
038    dialog = new AlertDialog.Builder(requireContext())
039//        .setIcon() // TODO: 11/3/23 Import a suitable icon drawable.
040        .setTitle(R.string.passphrase_details)
041        .setView(binding.getRoot())
042        .setPositiveButton(android.R.string.ok, (dlg, which) -> save())
043        .setNegativeButton(android.R.string.cancel, (dlg, which) -> { /* Do nothing. */ })
044        .create();
045    dialog.setOnShowListener((dlg) -> checkSubmitConditions());
046    binding.name.addTextChangedListener(this);
047    binding.words.addTextChangedListener(this);
048    binding.generate.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.generate(binding.length.getValue()));
049    binding.length.setMinValue(2); // FIXME: 11/3/23 Read from resources.
050    binding.length.setMaxValue(10); // FIXME: 11/3/23 Read from resources.
051    return dialog;
052  }
053
054  @Nullable
055  @Override
056  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
057      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
058    return binding.getRoot();
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
063    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
064    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity())
065        .get(PassphraseViewModel.class);
066    viewModel.clearGenerated();
067    viewModel
068        .getGenerated()
069        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(),
070            (words) -> binding.words.setText((words != null) ? String.join("\n", words) : ""));
071    passphrase = new Passphrase();
072    viewModel.clearPassphrase();
073    if (key != null) {
074      viewModel
075          .getPassphrase()
076          .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (passphrase) -> {
077            if (passphrase != null) {
078              binding.name.setText(passphrase.getName());
079              binding.words.setText(String.join("\n", passphrase.getWords()));
080              this.passphrase = passphrase;
081            }
082          });
083      viewModel.fetch(key);
084    }
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public void onDestroyView() {
089    binding = null;
090    super.onDestroyView();
091  }
092
093  @Override
094  public void beforeTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int count, int after) {
095    // Do nothing.
096  }
097
098  @Override
099  public void onTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int before, int count) {
100    // Do nothing.
101  }
102
103  @Override
104  public void afterTextChanged(Editable s) {
105    checkSubmitConditions();
106  }
107
108  /** @noinspection DataFlowIssue */
109  private void save() {
110    passphrase.setName(binding.name.getText().toString().strip());
111    passphrase.clear();
112    SPLITTER
113        .splitAsStream(binding.words.getText().toString())
114        .filter((word) -> !word.isEmpty())
115        .forEach(passphrase::append);
116    viewModel.save(passphrase);
117    // TODO: 11/6/23 Wait for a successful response.
118  }
119
120  private void checkSubmitConditions() {
121    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
122    dialog
123        .getButton(DialogInterface.BUTTON_POSITIVE)
124        .setEnabled(
125            !binding.name.getText().toString().isBlank()
126                && !binding.words.getText().toString().isBlank()
127        );
128  }
129
130}
